CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto speaker phone
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turn speaker phone on in calls whenever phone is moved away from face.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Legacy mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Earpiece mode may work better with this on some older devices.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Remove boost option
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: The boost option won't work on typical Android 4.2.1+ devices, so you might as well remove it. Changing this option requires restarting Earpiece.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Non-uniform boost
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Improves boosted voice clarity and MAY help decrease danger to speakers by focusing boost mainly on mid-level frequencies.

ListPreference.android:title: Maximum allowed boost
ListPreference.android:summary: Be extra careful with boosts above 40. Even 40 or less can be dangerous.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Quiet camera
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Come back here to turn this off before upgrading or deinstalling, or you'll have an orphan process until you reboot.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify LED when off
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Make the notification LED flash only function when device is off.
